match.schema:
type: object
additionalProperties: false
required:
  - period_seconds
  - max_picking_duration_limit
  - max_place_idle_duration
  - estimated_duration_coefficient
  - place_disable_offset_time
  - place_enable_delay
properties:
    period_seconds:
        type: integer
    max_picking_duration_limit:
        type: integer
    max_place_idle_duration:
        type: integer
    estimated_duration_coefficient:
        type: integer
    place_disable_offset_time:
        type: integer
    place_enable_delay:
        type: integer
